title: The Rise and Fall of the Black Blue-Collar Middle Class, part 2
itunes:title: The Rise and Fall of the Black Blue-Collar Middle Class, part 2
description: Umass Lowell Economics professor William Lazonick, outlines the history of how government policy and economic conditions contributed to the rise and fall of a Black blue-collar middle class. Part 2 takes a closer look at the role of finance and stock buybacks and what can be done to reverse the trend towards growing inequality.
